events: Co-founded the Academy of the Progress of the Desiderosi (Academy of the Eager)
Created famous series of engravings 'Lovers' Series'
Appointed to work at the court of Cardinal Odoardo Farnese
Produced a series of designs for the book 'Raccolta di alcuni disegni del Carracci'
Participated in the decoration of the Palazzo del Giardino in Parma
